title: Andra
description: Sub-City One: 2000 years from now. A young woman, Andra, has had a brain-graft operation and has been given the brain of a boy who died in 1987.Through the boy's mind, she comes to realise that her world is restrictive. The laws are rigid, the rulers suppress individuality. Andra turns against such totalitarian authority and inspires the young people of Sub-City One to rebel with her.This is the story of their fight. A fight for freedom.
author: Louise Lawrence
